title: Bribie
creator_credit: Kevin Brady, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Kevin Brady sets the record straight on the Battle of Bribie, considered to be the closest Australia got to losing a battle in Vietnam. His “digger’s account” illustrates the major obstacles and the bravery shown by the men, who were met with gunfire on landing.
creator_credit_for_label: Kevin Brady, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
